experience.title: Data Consultant
experience.description: • Forecasted excessive production of harmful by-products for a multinational chemical company applying XGBoost, Random Forest, and LightGBM•Implemented Shapley Additive explanation (SHAP), to indentify Top 3 critical features responsible for 63% of the production of the targeted by-product• Investigated interaction effects of features and high production period on target variable via Partial Dependence Plots and Force Plots of Shapley Values• Integrated ChatGPT LLM with textual and tabular organizational data, employing innovative techniques using LangChain and Vector Embeddings
experience.description_html: • Forecasted excessive production of harmful by-products for a multinational chemical company applying XGBoost, Random Forest, and LightGBM•Implemented Shapley Additive explanation (SHAP), to indentify Top 3 critical features responsible for 63% of the production of the targeted by-product• Investigated interaction effects of features and high production period on target variable via Partial Dependence Plots and Force Plots of Shapley Values• Integrated ChatGPT LLM with textual and tabular organizational data, employing innovative techniques using LangChain and Vector Embeddings

experience.title: Project Consultant, Equity Research
experience.description: - Conducting detailed scrutiny of a publicly traded smallcap company to uncover company-specific and sectorial challenges- Analyzed past AGMs and con-calls and related them to financial statements patterns and irregularities

experience.title: Quantitative Researcher
experience.description: - Working on Statistical Arbitrage and using Technical Analysis for investments/long term trading- Developed Machine Learning based Trading strategies to achieve a cagr of 39.6% with a Sharpe Ratio of 1.89, a Calmar Ratio of 3.16, and a Sortino Ratio of 3.05 on backtested result- Build strategy screeners using Momentum Indicators

experience.title: Team Leader Business Development
experience.description: - Organized and managed the first ever online version of our Flagship event YouthSpeak Forum, 2020 - Curated and organized Exploria, a Nationwide Career Development Seminar with domain experts across the globeAIESEC is an international youth-run, non-governmental and not-for-profit organization that provides young people with leadership development, cross-cultural internships, and global volunteer exchange experiences. experience.title: Sub-Head
experience.description: - Responsible for Mentoring 35+ students in Finance, Strategy and Analytics by holding weekly sessionsB-Club, IIT Kharagpur, is a non-profit organization aiming to familiarize its members, with the technicalities of analytics, finance and consultancy. We strive to enhance our knowledge through in-house sessions, presentations, hands-on workshops and discussions. Matters deliberated vary from practical problems to hypothetical ones. The club serves as an excellent interface among students, professionals, faculty and alumni and develops the members into creative thinkers and strategists much before they step into the big world of business.

courses: [{"subtitle":"-","title":"Banking Theory and Practices"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Computational Statistics"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Deep Learning Foundations and its Applications"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Derivatives"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Design Analysis and Algorithm"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Economics of Entrepreneurship"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Entrepreneurship Essentials"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Equity Research"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Financial Institutions and Markets"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Financial Management"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Financing New Ventures"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Game Theory"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"General Equilibrium"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"International Finance"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"International Trade"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Machine Learning Foundations and its Applications"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Macroeconomics"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Market Microstructure"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Microeconomics"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Probability and Statistics"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Product Development"}]
recommendations: Avnish Midha “Priyam is a very unique individual with exceptional knowledge & skills that spans across Quantitative Analysis/Research, Macro / Micro Economics, Financial Instruments, Trading Strategies, Global Factors & what not! Coupled with good programming & machine learning skills, and a very positive attitude. A very knowledge driven individual who keeps experimenting with ideas to validate & grow further on the same. Quite frankly, he has been an inspiration for me! Surely a great asset for any quant fund, investment bank or financial research organisation to have!”

Ratnesh Bhosale “I highly recommend Priyam, a remarkable professional I had the pleasure of knowing at IIT Kharagpur. With a demonstrated mastery In finance, Priyam recently cleared FRM Part 1, showcasing his dedication and analytical prowess. His proficiency extends to data science and machine learning, where he adeptly transforms data into strategic insights. Priyam's collaborative spirit and constant pursuit of excellence make him a valuable asset to any team. His multidimensional expertise is an asset that any organization would benefit from.”
publications: [{"title":"Sales forecasting of a food and beverage company using deep clustering frameworks","subtitle":"International Journal of Production Research","date":"July 3, 2023","description":"The paper provides implementations and insight into strategies to achieve forecasting better accuracy with Big data for non-cyclical Industries like Food and Beverage. The Journal paper was expanded upon from a conference paper, driven by the noteworthy nature of its content as requested by the publisher."},{"title":"Demand Forecasting of a Multinational Retail Company using Deep Learning Frameworks","subtitle":"International Federation of Automatic Control","description":"The paper aimed to improve corporate efficiency by better demand forecasting methodologies. It uses extensive deep learning algorithms on a Multinational Retail Consumer Company based out of America and compares the different Algorithms. Alternatively, it can also be used by investors who aim to predict sales for valuations purposes. Stage: The paper has been selected and presented in IFAC MIM 2022 at Nates, France. Paper received an extension request for publishing as a Journal Paper."}]
projects: [{"title":"Masters Thesis Project : Efficacy of Machine Learning Methods for Stock Selection","start_date":"May 2023","end_date":"May 2024","description":"This project involves stock direction prediction using Machine Learning Models to create a selection strategy and test the efficacy of ML Models for stock selection"},{"title":"Bad Days and Good Nights : A Re-Examination of Non-Traded and Traded Period Returns","description":"This is a simple data mining strategy where we do continuous BTST trades (Buy today and sell tomorrow)This is an implementation of the paper : Bad Days and Good Nights: A Re-Examination of Non-Traded and Traded Period Returnsby Zvi Wiener and Robert Tompkins"},{"title":"Creative Shock : Global Business Case Challenge","description":"Ranked in the Top 100 teams worldwide, developed an analysis report on a restaurant, and curated a Marketing Strategy for a Lithuanian company"},{},{},{"title":"Stock Valuation with Dividend Discount Model"}]
